globalRules: Images must be generated either as 1536×1024 (landscape) or 1024×1536 (portrait).
All important characters and story information must be clearly visible in the final image.
No gutters, borders, or margins are ever allowed.

1.name: Hero
1.description: Single full-page panel for establishing shots or iconic moments.

2.name: VerticalDiptych
2.description: Two stacked portrait panels. Suitable for dialogue, reaction, or progression.

3.name: LandscapeDiptych
3.description: Two equal panels side-by-side. Useful for opposing forces or cause/effect.

4.name: Quad
4.description: Four-panel grid (2×2) for rapid beats or multiple viewpoints.

compositionChecklist: Are all characters clearly visible within the panel?
Are faces, gestures, and interactions readable at panel size?
Does the layout choice serve the narrative purpose of the page?
